page.title: 06Clubs
page.content: We have a lot of clubs in Ashton for young and old people. For the young we have Brownies, Cubs, Scouts and Guides . For middle-aged people W.I., Gardening Club, Flower Club, Slimming Club and P.T.A.Activities. For teenagers there is the A.C.F. and Youth Club. Old Age Pensioners have the Golden Club. Most people in Ashton go to clubs or some kind of association and one quarter of the people go to clubs outside Ashton. Most clubs meet in their own hut. When asked if they thought there were sufficent clubs in Ashton 2/3 said yes and 1/3 said no.These are some of the clubs people would like to see in the village; Tennis ,Football, Gymnastics, Badminton,Table Tennis, Sports, History ,and Bridge.
